title: Making It Legal to Play Outside: “Reasonable Childhood Independence” Bills
dot: digraph LetGrow{rankdir=TB;node[shape=box];main_goal[label="Let Grow's goal: Make it easy, normal and legal to give kids old - fashioned independence"];legal_part[label="Help states pass Reasonable Childhood Independence laws"];open_ended[label="Most states' neglect laws are too open - ended"];legislation[label="Let Grow - supported legislation ensures kids are ALLOWED to do childhood activities on their own as long as not in obvious, serious and likely danger"];main_goal->legal_part;legal_part->open_ended;legal_part->legislation;states[label="States considering Reasonable Childhood Independence bills"];connecticut[label="CONNECTICUT: Multiple vehicles for presenting bill, significant support"];illinois[label="ILLINOIS: Renewed effort by Republican legislator"];michigan[label="MICHIGAN: Well - respected sponsors"];virginia[label="VIRGINIA: Bill passed unanimously in Senate Judiciary Committee"];nebraska[label="NEBRASKA: Bill introduced, optimistic"];nevada[label="NEVADA: Bill being reconsidered by bipartisan sponsors"];south_carolina[label="SOUTH CAROLINA: Sponsor likely to try again"];west_virginia[label="WEST VIRGINIA: Bill proposed"];states->connecticut;states->illinois;states->michigan;states->virginia;states->nebraska;states->nevada;states->south_carolina;states->west_virginia;involved[label="How to get involved"];share[label="Share time, expertise or stories"];check[label="Check own state's neglect laws"];donate[label="Support work with a donation"];contact[label="Contact info@LetGrow.org"];main_goal->involved;involved->share;involved->check;involved->donate;involved->contact;}
